content: an archived copy of the pattern can be found here 1 click the ** impatient ** text on the bottom right of the page to force it to come through done in 2 colors of yarn main and contrast the pattern at the web site is for an afghan made from 50 squares pattern calls for decor 9 skeins of mc and 6 skeins of cc instructions included on the pattern s page embroidery stitches 2 diagram for joining the squares 3 also included in the pattern special abbreviations bcl = beginning cluster btcl = beginning treble cluster cluster = cluster sc3tog = draw up loop in last st of square draw up loop in space between squares draw up loop in first st of next square yarn over and draw through 4 loops tcl = treble cluster 1 http //web archive org/web/20100928022214/http //www canadianliving com/crafts/crochet/crocheted_snowflake_afghan php 2 http //old canadianliving com/canadianliving/client/en/today/detailglossary asp idsection=17636 3 http //old canadianliving com/canadianliving/client/en/today/detailglossary asp idsection=17637
